Iudex Gundyr.lore: A once-chosen champion who arrived too late to fulfill his destiny. He now stands as a gatekeeper, testing those who seek to link the flame.

phase_tips.phase_1: Stay behind him and avoid his wide swings.
phase_tips.phase_2: Be aggressive when he transforms into the Pus of Man.

Vordt of the Boreal Valley.lore: A former knight who succumbed to the cold influence of the Boreal Valley, turning into a mindless beast driven only by instinct.

phase_tips.phase_2: Stay behind him and attack between his lunges.

Curse-rotted Greatwood.lore: A decayed tree that has absorbed the curses of the Undead, mutating into a grotesque abomination.

phase_tips.phase_1: Attack the sacs on its body to deal massive damage.
phase_tips.phase_2: Watch out for the massive hand after the floor breaks.

Crystal Sage.lore: A rogue sorcerer who studied forbidden magic and betrayed the Academy of Lothric.

phase_tips.phase_1: Rush in and attack before he teleports.
phase_tips.phase_2: Find the real sage among his clones.

Aldrich, Devourer of Gods.lore: A former cleric who succumbed to cannibalism and became a sludge-like creature, consuming gods.

phase_tips.phase_1: Avoid his magic projectiles and fire attacks.
phase_tips.phase_2: Close the distance to prevent his most powerful attacks.

Dancer of the Boreal Valley.lore: A hauntingly graceful warrior bound to the Boreal Valley, her movements are deceptive and deadly.

phase_tips.phase_1: Stick to her left side to avoid wide slashes.
phase_tips.phase_2: Time dodges with her spinning combos.

Oceiros, the Consumed King.lore: A former king turned into a mad, blind dragon, obsessed with his child Ocelotte.

phase_tips.phase_1: Avoid his lunging attacks and tail swipes.
phase_tips.phase_2: Watch out for his frenzied charges and magic blasts.

Champion Gundyr.lore: An alternate version of Iudex Gundyr, showcasing his true strength as a champion.

phase_tips.phase_1: Learn his attack patterns and dodge accordingly.
phase_tips.phase_2: Be prepared for faster and more aggressive combos.

Lorian, Elder Prince and Lothric, Younge.lore: The elder prince Lorian fights in place of his younger brother, Lothric, who refuses to link the fire.

phase_tips.phase_1: Dodge Lorianâ€™s teleports and heavy attacks.
phase_tips.phase_2: Prioritize Lothric once he appears to prevent healing.

Nameless King.lore: The firstborn of Gwyn, stripped of his titles after siding with the dragons. Now, he roams the skies atop his storm-wielding wyvern.
prerequisites: Lorian, Elder Prince and Lothric, Younger Prince

phase_tips.phase_1: Target the wyvernâ€™s head for massive damage.
phase_tips.phase_2: Time dodges to his heavy lightning attacks.

Soul of Cinder.lore: A manifestation of all who have linked the flame before, wielding the abilities of past lords.

phase_tips.phase_1: Adapt to his various weapon styles.
phase_tips.phase_2: Time your dodges against his flame sword attacks.

Yhorm the Giant.lore: Yhorm the Giant, one of the Lords of Cinder, is a massive creature who wields the Storm Ruler, a weapon designed to slay giants.

phase_tips.phase_1: Use the Storm Ruler to deal massive damage.
phase_tips.phase_2: Stay behind him and avoid his charging attacks.

Abyss Watchers.lore: The Abyss Watchers are a group of warriors dedicated to fighting the Abyss, using their flame to defeat the encroaching darkness.

phase_tips.phase_1: Focus on the one who attacks you, as the others will fight each other.
phase_tips.phase_2: Watch out for the flames they summon in the second phase.

Deacons of the Deep.lore: The Deacons of the Deep serve as guardians of the Cathedral of the Deep, wielding the power of the Deep in service to Aldrich.

phase_tips.phase_1: Focus on the main Deacon and avoid the swarming lesser Deacons.
phase_tips.phase_2: Avoid the explosion when the main Deacon is defeated.

High Lord Wolnir.lore: High Lord Wolnir was a king who became a giant skeletal entity after consuming the cursed black soil.

phase_tips.phase_1: Destroy the bracelets on his arms to deal damage.
phase_tips.phase_2: Stay close to him during the second phase to avoid his curse attacks.
